name: Witching Hour (itch) (Rye and/or Hyper)
description:
Note: currently a bug that messes up enemy spawning after losing a game. Refresh the game/page to get it working correctly again!

A short game about a cat named Dorcha who loves her human, Órlaith, very dearly and wishes to protect him from supernatural spirits who try to harm him. 

  • Controls: 
    • Arrow Keys for movement
    • "E" for dropping items
    ("E" 키를 누르면 선택된 들고있는 물건 아이템을 떨어트림 됩니다.)

Made for College Midterms (GAME 210-K01).
